alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 31 at 2:05PM MST until January 01 at 9:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 50 mph with gust up to 70 mph. * WHERE...The Uplands of the Bootheel. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 9 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel
